General.Name: UAC Global Public Company Limited
General.Description: UAC Global Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the trading, alternative and renewable energy, latex emulsion and polymer, and petroleum businesses in Thailand and internationally. It operates through Trading, Manufacturing and Sales of Chemical Products, Manufacturing and Sales of Petroleum, Consulting, and Others segments. The company imports and distributes chemicals and equipment; provides consultant and advising for marketing products and services; produces and distributes biogas; and produces and distributes compressed natural gas, liquefied petroleum gas, and natural gas liquid, as well as engages in the subcontracting of construction of machines and equipment. It also engages in the generation and sale of electricity and alternative energy; land development business for construction of waste management plant to produce renewable energy; and production and distribution of fuel briquette. The company provides its products and services for various industries, including offshore, refinery, upstream petrochemicals, liquid chemicals, power and utilities, chemical and solvent, base oil and additive, emission and waste management, and manufacturing. The company was formerly known as Universal Adsorbents & Chemicals Public Company Limited and changed its name to UAC Global Public Company Limited in April 2014. The company was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

1.Name: Ms. Nilrat  Jarumanopas
1.Title: Chief Fin. and Accounting Officer & Director
